title: So if I go morde bot
body:
And make sure to inform EVERYONE I am going bot, and someone steals my role and goes adc, is this punishable.

Riot lyte pls

replies.body:
yes.

Unless you ended up not getting bot lane from the system
Good. Report sent. We still won, but our toplane shen was forced to support me, and I was forced to go top. Pretty annoying.

Forced?
It's a privilege to roll solo with Morde.

How exactly have you lasted as long as you have with that name, OP?

Oh, by the way, you can report people for "lane stealing," but don't expect Riot to punish them.  I've yet to see anyone come to the forums complaining they were punished for that.

Little more than a year.

It doesn't violate the summoners code, so It will stay this way. Also it makes for some funny reactions when people cant report me for anything so they decide to go for the "Your name is offensive reported!!!!!!111!"
